235:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila kasmiṃścidanupakruṣṭagotracāritre svadharmānuvṛttiprakāśayaśasi vinayācāraślāghini mahati brāhmaṇakule janmaparigrahaṃ cakāra|
235:4: sa yathākramaṃ garbhādhānapuṃsavanasīmantonnayanajātakarmādibhiḥ kṛtasaṃskārakramo vedādhyayananimittaṃ śrutābhijanācārasampanne gurau prativasati sma|
235:11: atha tasyādhyāpakaḥ sarveṣāmeva śiṣyāṇāṃ śīlaparīkṣānimittaṃ svādhyāyaviśrāmakāleṣvātmano dāridryaduḥkhānyabhīkṣṇamupavarṇayāmāsa|
235:16: atha te tasya śiṣyāḥ pratodasaṃcoditā iva sadaśvā gurusnehātsamupajātasaṃvegāḥ sampannataraṃ prabhūtataraṃ ca bhaikṣamupasaṃharanti sma|
235:20: asmatparikleśāmarṣibhistu bhavadbhirayameva yatno dhanāharaṇaṃ prati yuktaḥ karttuṃ syāt| kutaḥ ?
235:23: śiṣyā ūcuḥ-kiṃ kariṣyāmo mandabhāgyā vayaṃ yadetāvānnaḥ śaktiprayāmaḥ| api ca
235:37: āpaddharmaḥ steyamiṣṭaṃ dvijānāmāpaccāntyā niḥsvatā nāma loke|
235:38: tasmād bhojyaṃ svaṃ pareṣāmaduṣṭaiḥ sarvaṃ caitad brāhmaṇānāṃ svameva||8||
235:39: kāmaṃ prasahyāpi dhanāni hartuṃ śaktirbhavedeva bhavadvidhānām|
235:40: na tveṣa yogaḥ svayaśo hi rakṣyaṃ śūnyeṣu tasmādvyavaseyameva||9||
235:41: iti muktapragrahāstena te chātrāḥ paramamiti tattasya vacanamayuktamapi yuktamiva pratyaśrauṣuranyatra bodhisattvāt|
235:45: atha sa teṣāmadhyāpako bodhisattvamavekṣya taṃ vidhimanabhinandantamapratikrośantaṃ niviṣṭaguṇasambhāvanastasminmahāsattve kiṃ nu khalvayamavyavasitatvānniḥsnehatayā vā mayi steyaṃ na pratipadyate,
235:50: kathaṃ nu niḥsambhramadīnamānaso bhavāniti svasthavadeva tiṣṭhati||12||
235:56: nāsti loke raho nāma pāpaṃ karma prakurvataḥ|
235:57: adṛśyāni hi paśyanti nanu bhūtāni mānuṣān||13||
235:60: ahaṃ punarna paśyāmi śūnyaṃ kvacana kiñcana|
235:61: yatrāpyanyaṃ na paśyāmi nanvaśūnyaṃ mayaiva tat||15||
235:62: pareṇa yacca dṛśyeta duṣkṛtaṃ svayameva vā|
235:65: rāgārpitaikāgramatiḥ svayaṃ tu pāpaṃ prakurvanniyamena vetti||17||
235:68: na cātra me niścayameti mānasaṃ dhanārthamevaṃ prataredbhavānapi|
235:69: avetya ko nāma guṇāguṇāntaraṃ guṇopamardaṃ dhanamūlyatāṃ nayet||18||
235:72: vyatītya lajjāṃ na tu dharmavaiśase surendratārthe'pyupasaṃhṛtaṃ manaḥ||19||
235:73: atha tasyopādhyāyaḥ praharṣavismayākṣiptahṛdaya utthāyāsanātsampariṣvajyainamuvāca-sādhu sādhu putraka ! sādhu sādhu mahābrāhmaṇa ! pratirūpametatte praśamālaṅkṛtasyāsya medhāvikasya|
235:82: tadevamātmalajjayaiva satpuruṣā nācāravelāṃ laṅghayantīti hrībalenāryeṇa bhavitavyam|
235:83: evaṃ hrīparikhāsampanna āryaśrāvako'kuśalaṃ prajahāti kuśalaṃ ca bhāvayatītyevamādiṣu sūtreṣūpaneyam|
